articles.description: For months we didn't hear a peep out of Bakkt, and now the NYSE owner-backed exchange won't hush and it's music to the ears of the crypto community. Bakkt for a year now has been viewed as a future catalyst for bitcoin adoption on Wall Street given its regula…

articles.author: Samantha Chang
articles.title: Square Crypto Praises Gimmicky Bitcoin Giveaways but Doesn't Give Any Away
articles.description: Square Crypto, the cryptocurrency unit of Jack Dorsey's mobile-payment company Square, extolled the virtues of gimmicky bitcoin giveaways. But then it didn't offer to give any away. What a crypto tease! Do bitcoin giveaways promote adoption? Basically, Square…
articles.content:
Square Crypto, the cryptocurrency unit of Jack Dorsey's mobile-payment company Square, extolled the virtues of gimmicky bitcoin giveaways.
But then it didn't offer to give any away. What a crypto tease!
Do bitcoin giveaways promote adoption?
